title: Samsung Galaxy A26 support pages go live, launch is imminent
description: Samsung's Galaxy A26 was seen in a new set of renders recently, and the phone is now clearly on the verge of becoming official. That's because support pages for it have been spotted going live on Samsung's websites in the UK, Ireland, and Latin America. Previously, the device has also been certified by India's BIS, TUV Rheinland, and the Bluetooth SIG, so a lot of the prerequisite steps for launch have been undertaken. Samsung Galaxy A26 support pages The Galaxy A25 went official in December of 2023, so its successor is already kind of late if we go by the usual one-year...

text: Samsung's Galaxy A26 was seen in a new set of renders recently, and the phone is now clearly on the verge of becoming official. That's because support pages for it have been spotted going live on Samsung's websites in the UK, Ireland, and Latin America. Previously, the device has also been certified by India's BIS, TUV Rheinland, and the Bluetooth SIG, so a lot of the prerequisite steps for launch have been undertaken. Samsung Galaxy A26 support pages The Galaxy A25 went official in December of 2023, so its successor is already kind of late if we go by the usual one-year smartphone lifespan. Hopefully Samsung will announce it soon. Past rumors talked about the handset coming with a 6.64-inch screen, the Exynos 1280 SoC at the helm, 6GB of RAM in one version, and the following dimensions: 164 x 77.5 x 7.7 mm. It will thus be taller, wider, and slimmer than the A25. The A26 will most likely launch with Android 15 on board underneath One UI 7. Via
html:
Samsung's Galaxy A26 was seen in a new set of renders recently, and the phone is now clearly on the verge of becoming official. That's because support pages for it have been spotted going live on Samsung's websites in the UK, Ireland, and Latin America.

Previously, the device has also been certified by India's BIS, TUV Rheinland, and the Bluetooth SIG, so a lot of the prerequisite steps for launch have been undertaken.


Samsung Galaxy A26 support pages

The Galaxy A25 went official in December of 2023, so its successor is already kind of late if we go by the usual one-year smartphone lifespan. Hopefully Samsung will announce it soon.

Past rumors talked about the handset coming with a 6.64-inch screen, the Exynos 1280 SoC at the helm, 6GB of RAM in one version, and the following dimensions: 164 x 77.5 x 7.7 mm. It will thus be taller, wider, and slimmer than the A25. The A26 will most likely launch with Android 15 on board underneath One UI 7.

Via
